PSCT.Base: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 card that mentions "Black Rose Dragon" from your Deck to your hand, except "Roxrose Dragon". While this card is in your GY, if a face-up "Rose Dragon" monster(s) or Plant Synchro Monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Roxrose Dragon" once per turn.
